entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
